title: Ingrid Gran Turismo R debuts 1x road group, 100% made in Italy for 11 or 12-speed bikes
content:
Ingrid Components just dropped the full details on Gran Turismo R, their 100% made-in-Italy 1x road bike drivetrain for either 11-speed or 12-speed builds. Paring back to the core essentials, Ingrid’s 1x road group includes their beautifully in-house machined cassettes, alloy cranksets, and clutched derailleur that works with the shifter you already have on your […]

The post Ingrid Gran Turismo R debuts 1x road group, 100% made in Italy for 11 or 12-speed bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
